title: Android 13 DP1 brings a redesigned media player UI, preps “Media Tap To Transfer” feature
content:
The first developer preview of Android 13 is officially out. While the final release won’t come out until later this year, the first preview gives us a broad outline of changes and features that are coming in the next major release of Android. From updated privacy features and improvements to Material You theming to new

The post Android 13 DP1 brings a redesigned media player UI, preps “Media Tap To Transfer” feature appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Android 13 DP1 showcases improvements coming to the media playback experience, including a redesigned media output picker UI.
